name: Holy Hell
description:
Holy Hell is a single-player action-adventure game in which you have a personal vendetta with God. How did this come to be? Well, after a life filled with misfortune and bad luck, you end up falling off a cliff on top of another person, both losing your lives. As a consequence, you wake up in Hell. You are so enraged with all the injustice you've suffered that you find a way to break into Heaven with the Devil's sword looking for revenge. With the sword and many powerful abilities, slaughter anyone who comes between you and the almighty God.

The gameplay is mostly exploration and combat, with hack'n'slash vibes.
